name: Three Nights at Frosty's 2
description:
It's been 10 years after the horrific events of Frosty's Ice-Cream World. Even Frosty's Ice-Cream Parlour wasn't enough to wipe out the memories of the old Milk Bar! So We started fresh, welcome to the all new Frosty's Ice-Cream world, where Magic is real!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T/W. Frosty- Enters through hall, put on mask to make him go away
T/W. Jolly- Enters through left vent, put on mask to make her go away
T. Kenneth- Stalks through hall, flash at him from time to time to make him go away
QWERTYUIOP- Wind music box to make it go away
Balloon Girl/W.Kenneth- Enters through right vent, put on mask when you see her/him at the vent
W. Frosty- Starts moving at night 3, he'll enter through the hall, put mask on to make him go away
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TNaF 1: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/411701865/
TNaF 3: COMING SOON
TNaF 3: August 4th, 2021
My friend @PaperKoops/@Bagductions tested this, and he was shaking, so... you're in for a scare.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
@TechDevo for the coding

CAST:
